author: Julia Jones and Christina Maxouris, CNN
title: 3 former Minneapolis police officers found guilty of violating George Floyd's civil rights
description: Former Minneapolis police officers Tou Thao, J. Alexander Kueng and Thomas Lane were found guilty of violating George Floyd's civil rights by a federal jury in St. Paul, Minnesota, on Thursday.
